Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Databricks Notebooks Skill for Claude Code

- Add databricks_client.py for notebook operations \(list, export, import, delete\)
- Add catalog_client.py for Unity Catalog schema browsing
- Add notebook_parser.py for cell-level editing
- Add config_helper.py for Databricks configuration management
- Add setup.sh for one-click installation
- Add import verification to detect failed saves
- Add comprehensive documentation in SKILL.md

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
